mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT LABEL, "DESC", PRICE, IMAGE, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC) AS RN FROM ITEMS ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND #{value}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT LABEL, "DESC", PRICE, IMAGE, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY ORDERS DESC) AS RN FROM ITEMS ORDER BY ORDERS DESC) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND #{value}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT I.ITEM_ID, I.LABEL, I.PRICE, I.IMAGE, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY I.REG_DATE) AS RN FROM ITEMS I JOIN ITEMS_TAGS T ON T.TAG_ID = #{value} WHERE I.ITEM_ID = T.ITEM_ID ORDER BY I.REG_DATE) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 8
SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC) AS RN FROM ITMES) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{value} AND #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEMS SET CATEGORY=#{category}, LABEL=#{label}, DESC=#{desc}, IMAGE=#{image}, PRICE=#{price}, STOCK=#{stock} WHERE ITEM_ID=#{item_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER(ORDER_ID, ITEM_ID, MEMBER_ID, QUANTITY, STATE) SELECT ORDER_ID, ITEM_ID, MEMBER_ID, QUANTITY, SUM(STATE,1 ) AS STATE FROM ORDER WHERE STATUS = 0 AND ORDER_ID = #{value}
